name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend system design and development. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and utilizing **Postgres** for efficient data management. Skilled in containerization and orchestration using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring scalable and maintainable applications. Experienced in implementing **AWS** solutions and continuous integration/continuous deployment (**CI/CD**) practices, alongside maintaining high standards in **unit testing**, **integration testing**, and **automated quality assurance**. Demonstrated ability to deliver robust APIs and cloud-native architectures within the financial services sector, contributing to significant projects for industry leaders such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer high-performance backend services, streamlining document automation with a **20% increase** in workflow efficiency.
Implemented **Postgres** as the primary database solution, optimizing query performance and ensuring data integrity for over **500,000** records.
Developed robust event-driven architectures using **Celery** and **Redis**, achieving a **30% reduction** in response time for asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests.
Deployed and managed microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, which improved deployment speed by **40%**.
Designed and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely delivery of accurate data to stakeholders within **24 hours** of request.
Conducted security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication systems, significantly enhancing security protocols.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges while ensuring compliance and implementing effective release strategies, contributing to a seamless CI/CD process.

• Developed robust backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and enhance reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing for over **5,000** transaction requests daily.
• Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to ensure a consistent and scalable environment across **multiple regions**. 
• Engineered secure data pipelines for regulatory data exchange, leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline data flow, successfully improving data processing efficiency by **30%**.
• Conducted comprehensive security audits for compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, overseeing system integration to meet regulatory compliance and successful release management for a major update in **Q3 2023**.

• Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python** and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform.
• Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, while adhering to internal data security protocols.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management.
• Enhanced deployment processes utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, improving service scalability and reliability with a **90%** reduction in downtime.
• Achieved **30%** faster integration testing cycles through automated quality assurance practices, leveraging CI/CD strategies to ensure consistent delivery.
